title.rendered: Consultation Technical Workshop on the Report with Recommendations for Revision of the National Higher Educational Program and Curriculum for the Medical Doctor Profession (Project Output 1.6)

content.rendered:
The “Consultation Technical Workshop on the Report with Recommendations for Revision of the National Higher Educational Program and Curriculum for the Medical Doctor Profession (Project Output 1.6)” is currently taking place at Hotel Sirius, Pristina! 
 
This workshop brings together key participants from the Ministry of Education, Science, Technology, and Innovation (MESTI), the State Council for the Regulated Professions (SCRP), the Kosovo Accreditation Agency, the University of Pristina, the Faculty of Medicine, the Medical Doctors Chamber, the Board for Specialist Education, and other relevant stakeholders.
 
The focus of the discussions is on enhancing medical education in Kosovo by aligning it with EU standards, revising the curriculum, and recommending specializations
